text: The 2010 Philadelphia Independence season was the team's inaugural season of competition in the Women's Professional Soccer league. ==Review== The Philadelphia Independence of Women's Professional Soccer ended the 2010 season with a record of 10 wins and 10 losses and 4 ties for 34 points finishing third in WPS. The team compiled a postseason mark of 2-1. Paul Riley coached the team. The 2010 Philadelphia Independence lost in the Championship. ==Squad== ===Roster=== 2010 Independence Roster ===Team management=== ==Competition== ===Women's Professional Soccer=== ====Regular
